Class ImmovableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObjects.GameObject
      • gameObjects.ImmovableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IObserved
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barricada, BombaAtomica, BombaCongelante, Diente, EscudoProtector, Vendedor

    public abstract class ImmovableObject
extends GameObject
    Objetos inamovibles que pueden aparecer en el juego
    Author:
    Pippig, Matias Gonzalez, Lucas
